org.factcenter.qilin.primitives

Interface NonInteractiveCommitment.Verifier<C,E,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - Commitment type
    E - Element type
    R - Randomness type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TrapdoorNonInteractiveCommitment.RevealingVerifier<C,E,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ECPedersen, ECTrapdoorPedersen, PedersenCommitment, RandomOracleCommitment, TrapdoorPedersenCommitment, ZpPedersen, ZpTrapdoorPedersen
    Enclosing interface:
    NonInteractiveCommitment

    public static interface NonInteractiveCommitment.Verifier<C,E,R>
    Represents the Verifier in a non-interactive commitment scheme.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean verifyCommitment(C commitment)
      Verify that a commitment is valid
      boolean verifyOpening(C commitment, E element, R randomness)
      Verify that the commitment was correctly opened to a specific value.

    • Method Detail

      • verifyCommitment

        boolean verifyCommitment(C commitment)
        Verify that a commitment is valid
        Parameters:
        commitment -
        Returns:
        true iff the commitment is valid.

      • verifyOpening

        boolean verifyOpening(C commitment,
                      E element,
                      R randomness)
        Verify that the commitment was correctly opened to a specific value.
        Parameters:
        commitment - the commitment value.
        element - the element claimed to the opening of the commitment.
        randomness - the randomness used to generate the commitment.
        Returns:
        true iff verification passed.
